text: Yoo Seong-min (유승민, born 7 January 1958), also known as Yoo Seung-min, is a South Korean economist and politician. Yoo is a member of the Korean National Assembly and was the Bareun Party's presidential nominee in the 2017 South Korean presidential election. He was an unsuccessful candidate for president again in 2025. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean politicians
title: Yoo Seong-min
